verbs.description: [ARG0: UFC fighter Colby Covington] [V: takes] [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's side] and slams the Philadelphia Eagles , who had their invitation to the White House to celebrate their 41 - 33 victory over the New England Patriots in Super Bowl LII ( 52 ) rescinded with less than 24 hours notice .
